This week, my co-authors [Kateřina Škardová](https://m3disim.saclay.inria.fr/people/katerina-skardova) and [Martin Genet](https://mgenet.github.io/), my collegues Jean-Marc Allain, Felipe Álvarez-Barrientos, Haotian Xiao, and Julien Bonnafé, and I attended the [2025 ICCB](https://iccb2025.org/) conference. [Kateřina Škardová](https://m3disim.saclay.inria.fr/people/katerina-skardova) and I both presented our work towards getting a real-time digital twin of the lungs [@daby-seesaramFiniteElementNeural2025;@skardovaFiniteElementNeural2025].


Meanwhile, [Martin Genet](https://mgenet.github.io/) chaired the mini-symposium "**MS08 - 1: Modeling the respiratory system: current trends and clinical opportunities**" he co-organised.
